LZ78

Class LZ78

  • java.lang.Object
    • LZ78.LZ78

  • public class LZ78
extends java.lang.Object
    LZ78 implements the Lempel-Ziv '78 algorithm using Trie data structures for increased time complexity.
    Author:
    Harshit Maheshwari

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LZ78(java.lang.String input, int alphabetSize)
      Constructs the Lempel-Ziv algorithm object.

      Compresses the input string based on LZ78 algorithm

      Returns the compressibility ratio of Lempel-Ziv 78 algorithm on the input string.

        Constructs the Lempel-Ziv algorithm object.

        input - String to be compressed

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        public int compress(boolean parse,
           boolean output,
           boolean graph)
        Compresses the input string based on LZ78 algorithm
        Parameters:
        parse - Boolean parameter specifying whether the parsed input string is printed on system output or not
        output - Boolean parameter specifying whether output string (as produced by LZ'78)should be printed on system output or not
        graph - Boolean parameter specifying whether compressibility data for graph should be produced on system output
        Returns:
        Output length of the compressed string

        Returns the compressibility ratio of Lempel-Ziv 78 algorithm on the input string.
